page.title: 06Shopping -Arndale Centre.
page.content: Eastbourne provides a good variety of shops in a pleasant atmosphere. The town's facilities attract shoppers from a wide area and are popular with visitors. The {Arndale Centre} is a modern covered and air-conditioned {shopping {complex}containing about 95 units of various sizes. The centre caters for local shoppers and holiday makers. All the major chain stores are represented (Marks & Spencer, C&A, Boots, Littlewoods and British Home Stores.) Cleanliness and security are important considerations for the manager. The centre has attractive seating areas with colourful floral displays and a central open area which features a stationary steam engine. An integral { {750 space car park}and nearby bus stops make the centre very accessible.
